case.title: Text field "Article title" should contain min 5 symbols
Text field "Article title" should contain max 240 symbols
Text field Ärticle title" can contain letters, numbers, special characters, spaces (can’t be first, last, and few in a row).
Text field "What's this article about"? should contain min 10 symbols
Text field "What's this article about"? should contain max 240 symbols
Text field "What's this article about"? can contain letters, numbers, special characters, spaces (can’t be first, last, and few in a row).
Text field "Write your article (in markdown)"? should contain min 20 symbols
Text field "Write your article (in markdown)"? should contain max 9000 symbols
Text field "Write your article (in markdown)"? can't be empty
Text field "Writre your acticle (in markdown)"? doesn’t accept any attachments;
Text field "Write your article (in markdown)"? can be slide-down right corner of text box to change its size by user
Text field "Write your article (in markdown)"? accept letters, numbers, special characters, spaces (can’t be first, last, and few in a row).
Text field "Enter tags" can be blank
Tag contain 2-30 symbols (only letters and numbers)
New post form validation by filling fields (besides "Tags")
User’s avatar at the lower left corner
Text field “Write a comment…”: 1-240 symbols (letters, numbers, special characters)
Text field "Write a comment" can be slide-down by user right corner of text box to change its size
“Post comment” button at the lower right corner: validate the form and if it isn’t empty post a comment.
Only logged in authors with created articles can get on the screen
“Edit article” button validates the form and saves changes added
Users can click on the “Edit article” button without any changes added
User’s avatar at the lower left corner
Text field “Write a comment…”: 1-240 symbols (letters, numbers, special characters)
Text field "Write a comment" can be slide-down by user right corner of text box to change its size
Pagination is uodated after new post added
User can insert text in "Email" field
Inputted email should be present in the server DB
User can insert text in "Password" field
Inputted password should be present in the server DB

custom.expected: Selection title 'Sign up" is shown on the registration page
"Have an account?' link redirect to "Sign in' page

case.title: Text field "Username" must contain min 4 letters
Text field "Username" must contain max 36 letters
Text field "Username" must contain only Latin characters
Text field "Username" must contain spec symbols “ - _ “
No Register sensitive in text field "Username"
[name] in text field "Email' should have integer/Latin/symbols( . _ +) characters
Text field "Password' must contain min 4 letters
Text field "Password' must contain max 30 letters
Text field "Password' should have Integer/Characters/ Symbols
Required password form: at least one symbol, one integer, capital letter
Text field "Confirm password' should have mask(***)
Text field "Confirm password" must contain min 4 letters
Text field "Confirm password" must contain max 30 letters
Text field "Confirm password" should have Integer/Characters/ Symbols
Required Confirm password form: at least one symbol, one integer, capital letter
“Usename already taken“ error message is shown after filled field by non-unique characters
“Email already taken“ error message is shown after filled field by non-unique characters
Tags shown list of articles with hight Q of Likes
Pagination is uodated after new post added
